thread.title: BRIEF-Rainbow Tours Q4 Net Loss Widens To 6.2 Mln Zlotys

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Rainbow Tours Q4 Net Loss Widens To 6.2 Mln Zlotys
text:
March 2 (Reuters) - RAINBOW TOURS SA
* REPORTED ON THURSDAY Q4 NET LOSS OF 6.2 MILLION ZLOTYS VERSUS LOSS OF 2.8 MILLION ZLOTYS YEAR AGO
* Q4 REVENUE 223.1 MILLION ZLOTYS VERSUS 199.5 MILLION ZLOTYS YEAR AGO
* Q4 OPERATING LOSS OF 7.3 MILLION ZLOTYS VERSUS LOSS OF 3.0 MILLION ZLOTYS YEAR AGO
Source text for Eikon:
Further company coverage: (Gdynia Newsroom)
